#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

There are three ways to add or modify digital signals in Adastra.

  * [OpenVibe] is being used for digital signal processing. This BCI application contains several filters implemented in the form of "boxes".
  * Adastra comes with some .NET libs that provide dsp.
  * Adastra can execute and use the result from [Octave](Matlab clone). This means that you can implement digital filters in Octave or use already available. You only need to provide your input and parse your output.
